overview: Jack Williams was the best friend of Vietnam veteran and detective Mike Hammer. When Jack is murdered, Mike makes it his business to solve the crime. He is helped by his secretary Velda, and partly helped, partly hindered by the Chief of Police, Pat Chambers. On the trail of the killer, Mike discovers government conspiracies, and plots used by the CIA and the Mafia.
tagline: The cops, the mob, the broads, everyone's after Hammer!
cast: Armand Assante|Barbara Carrera|Laurene Landon|Alan King|Geoffrey Lewis
